response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. After careful consideration, I propose that we discuss a transaction price of $1,350,000 for this product. I am confident that this price reflects its true worth while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your interests, and we can proceed to further discussions. If you have any questions or need more information about the product, please do not hesitate to ask.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
